HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: U cijene proizvoda nisu uključeni troškovi dostave. Troškovi dostave dodaju se vašoj narudžbi i oni se jasno vide u potrošačkoj košarici i na računu.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Kod plaćanja pouzećem (gotovinom) Hrvatska pošta dodatno naplaćuje naknadu u visini 1,83% (odnosno minimalno 5 kn) od otkupnog iznosa. Kurirska služba GLS ne naplaćuje naknadu pri naplati pouzeća.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only available method for online orders. PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Hrvatska pošta (Croatian Post) and GLS. PRICING: Shipping costs are not fixed; they are calculated and displayed in the shopping cart during checkout. There is no mention of a free shipping threshold. The delivery time for in-stock items is 3-10 days. RESTRICTIONS: There is no information available regarding express delivery, weekend delivery, or any specific surcharges or restrictions for delivering to Croatian islands. NOTABLE FEATURES: A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 1.83% (minimum 5 kn) applies only to orders delivered by Hrvatska pošta; GLS does not charge a COD fee. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase) page and is not easily accessible from a dedicated link. The information provided lacks crucial details such as specific shipping prices, a free shipping threshold, and policies for island deliveries, which diminishes the user experience.
